title: Does anyone care about mage supports?
body: Champs like Zyra and Brand in the support role...does anyone care that they were basically rapid-fire nerfed out of the meta? Do people think high damage support options are a viable, healthy option for the bot lane to have?

replies.body: I dont mind mage supports when they dont have huge base damage AND amazing utility{{champion:43}} {{champion:143}}
Zyra has amazing utility? She has a super telegraphed snare on her E and a knockup on her R. There are ADCs with more utility than her for crying out loud.

Brand is perfectly viable mid.

You only see him support because he can make his adc (or himself tbh) go 10/2/5 before the laning phase ends

###### I guess im biased tho because i think it shouldnt take 0.5 seconds for people to die at level 2

I wouldn't mind Zyra being shitty in support if she were at least still viable mid. Railroading her bot then balancing her around support (ie nerfing the hell outta her) was a pretty shitty move to people like me who played her mid.
i personally think brand is fine mid and he's only played support because he has an easy to land 1.5 second stun and huge damage potential past lvl 3

I actually don't have a problem with mage supports because of champions like {{champion:40}} who don't have (much of) anything meaningful outside of utility. They can't do damage, they can't tank, all they have is situational things. Granted, used tactically, those can be huge in both laning and teamfights, but even so. Take away a mage support's damage in favor of utility, and they can't accomplish much in the long run unless they're absurdly on the ball with their kit, and take enough utility off the damage and you may as well just go midlane (although I take {{champion:161}} support half the time I get filled, so there's that too)

Heaven forbid a support should actually be able to be helpful if their lane is doing poorly.

if riot can actually balance them for once then i'd be all for it

only if they introduce some bruiser supports though hehe
